  • Element
org.aludratest.testcase.data

Annotation Type Source


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=PARAMETER)
public @interface Source
    Defines the data source for a parameterized test method.
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String dataset 
      String emptyMarker 
      String encoding 
      String filter 
      String id 
      String nesting 
      String nullMarker 
      boolean rowBased 
      String segment 
      String selector 
      String separator 
      String uri 
      String value 

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Returns:
        may be used declare the data source's URI - the preferred tag for that is uri().
        Default:
        ""

      • id

        public abstract String id
        Returns:
        an ID value as reference to a JavaBean object in the context that serves as data source.
        Default:
        ""

      • selector

        public abstract String selector
        Returns:
        a selector clause specific for the data source, e.g. a SQL query term for data bases.
        Default:
        ""

      • uri

        public abstract String uri
        Returns:
        the data source's URI
        Default:
        ""

      • segment

        public abstract String segment
        Returns:
        a data segment (e.g. Excel sheet) to use
        Default:
        ""

      • filter

        public abstract String filter
        Returns:
        DatabeneScript filter string to filter row data
        Default:
        ""

      • separator

        public abstract String separator
        Returns:
        a separator declares the (e.g. CSV) separator character used in the data source
        Default:
        ""

      • dataset

        public abstract String dataset
        Returns:
        may be used to declare a sub set of a collection of given data files.
        Default:
        ""

      • nesting

        public abstract String nesting
        Returns:
        optional value to declare the type of dataset() selection.
        Default:
        ""

      • encoding

        public abstract String encoding
        Returns:
        the data source's character encoding
        Default:
        ""

      • emptyMarker

        public abstract String emptyMarker
        Returns:
        marker text used for declaring empty strings in the data source
        Default:
        ""

      • nullMarker

        public abstract String nullMarker
        Returns:
        The marker text used for declaring null values in the data source
        Default:
        ""

      • rowBased

        public abstract boolean rowBased
        Returns:
        'true' if the data sets are rows, 'false' if they are columns
        Default:
        true
